messages.author: Anonymous #007
messages.message: We're not trying to teach you a thing to copy. We're just here to teach you a technique, then let you loose into the world. Every highlight needs it's own personal shadow. So often we avoid running water, and running water is a lot of fun. Let all these things just sort of happen.

messages.author: Anonymous #001
messages.message: Life is too short to be alone, too precious. Share it with a friend. Every day I learn. The least little bit can do so much. Those great big fluffy clouds.
